title: LF jungle main Gold+ 5's
body:
...:::Now recruiting:::...
-  Jungle

                                                                                                    ...:::Team Goals:::...

Our team goal is to reach as high up the ladder as possible by the end of the season, this being said we would love to get some team compositions and strategies down pat first.

                                                                                                    ...::: About the team:::...
The team is made up of a skillful players that have reached up to diamond  in there solo que ranks.
current rankings

mid -plat 5
top -gold 4
adc -gold 3
sup- plat 5

                                                                                                     ...:::Requirements:::...
*To be a jungle main
*To be able to play at least 2 nights a week
*to communicate with the team via Skype.

: To show your interest reply in comments below and i will add you in game or just add me in game (rockstar)

replies.body: Hey there dude I might be able to try out this role your looking for. My Ign is "pyromancer" so hit me up if your keen
